snippet: The Giants and A’s have put the San Francisco Bay Area in danger of being the first metropolitan region to send two teams to the playoffs and have both leave winless.
abstract: San Francisco Giants and the Oakland Athletics have put the San Francisco Bay Area in danger of being the first metropolitan region to send two teams to the playoffs and have both leave without a win.
lead_paragraph: The Giants and A’s have put the San Francisco Bay Area in danger of being the first metropolitan region to send two teams to the playoffs and have both leave winless.

headline.seo: With Giants and A’s in 0-2 Holes, Bay Area Shutout Is Possible
headline.main: Bay Area Teams Rose Together, and Now Could Be Ousted Together
headline.print_headline: Bay Area Teams Rose Together, and Now Could Be Ousted Together
